body:
• Exact syntax varies depending on client -- we'll focus on REST
  • Data being queried needs to be in a format which can be processed with JS (JSON is best)
  • Issued via POST to /mapred
  • M/R jobs via REST have to be JSON (Content-type: application/json)
  • Takes the form:
    {"inputs":[...],"query":[...],"timeout":XXXX}
    • timeout - milliseconds (defaults to 60000)
